document_data.name: Ajwain
document_data.mainbody: '''Ajwain''' was an exotic fragrant edible [[herb]] from [[Chult]].
document_data.Availability: Ajwain was part of various [[spice]] mixes used and exported from [[Port Nyanzaru]] in Chult. Ajwain was mixed with [[coriander]], [[ginger]], varieties of [[curry]] powders, and brightly colored [[salt]]s. In the 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the [[Distant Shores]] trading company imported these Chultan spice mixes into the city of [[Baldur's Gate]].
